thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Rosie Lopez
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Rosie Lopez

author: Rosie Lopez
title: Rosie Lopez
text: We had a group of 11 people in our trip to Costa Rica. Shay with Costa Rican Vacations handled everything from excursions to hotels and transportation (to and from the airport and from Arenal to Manuel Antonio) I must say this trip could have not been more perfect thanks to her hard work!!! We plan on returning again and we will definitely use Costa Rican Vacations again!!
